job_description:
We are looking for a high-performing Senior Java Developer to join our growing team. In this role, you will be part of cutting-edge, high-visibility projects and delivering world-class solutions.

Key responsibilities for this position include:

Enjoy working with global business users across various business units that include Finance, Investment Banking, Trading, Legal, Compliance and Operations for delivery of software systems
Collaborating as part of a cross-functional Agile team to create and enhance software that enables state of the art, next generation Counterparty Data platform that enables our cloud transformation journey
Expertise in application, data and infrastructure architecture disciplines
Working with large, complex data sets from a variety of sources
Participate in the rapid development of user-driven prototypes to identify technical options and inform multiple architectural approaches
Building efficient storage and search functions over structured and unstructured data
Utilizing programming languages like Java, Scala, Python, Relational and NoSQL databases
Leveraging DevOps techniques and practices like Continuous Integration, Continuous Deployment, Test Automation, Build Automation and Test-Driven Development to enable the rapid delivery of working code utilizing tools like Jenkins, Gradle and Git

Requirements

Mandatory Skills:

10+ years of experience in development of high-quality java solutions

Experience as a Scrum master for a distributed team

Strong analytical and problem-solving ability

Experience with Java8+, Kafka, Mongo, Event driven systems

Experience with design and build of high performance, low latency distributed systems

Hands-on experience with Azure/AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, Spring Boot, Microservices.

Experience with SQL, NoSql like MongoDB

Have experience documenting system level software and knows best practices about 'docs as code' (e.g., by having used Git, Markdown)

Familiarity and hands-on experience with profiling, code efficiency, and building software via continuous delivery pipeline

Knowledge of Monitoring and Observability Tools like Prometheus, Grafana

Benefits

Why You'll Love Working at Prodigy

We are a collective group of people and collaboration is key to our process
We don’t work for our clients, we work with them
Easily accessible downtown location, connected to Union Station and PATH
Competitive compensation commensurate with experience
Everyone brings something valuable to the table in our supportive, challenging, and collaborative, diverse work environment

All Employees Can Participate in:

Company paid health benefits: 100% medical, dental and vision coverage
Corporate-discounted Gym Membership through GoodLife
Company discount program including Travel, Shopping, Attractions, Wellness, & Sporting events, just to name a few

Employee Referral Program
